name: Seven Starfighters [Alpha Release]
description:
Alpha release of top-down shooter Seven Starfighters. Three stages are now available for play:

  • Fleet Rendezvous (Easy)
  • Blue Expanse (Less-easy)
  • Magma Ruins (Least-easy)

Seven Starfighters takes inspiration from the old-school top down shooters of old, presenting a variety of challenging stages to be mastered. In addition, there is a comprehensive customisation system that allows players to mix and match their equipment loadout and modify their starfighter's performance to suit their playstyle.

Feedback and suggestions appreciated!

Change notes (v0.26):

  • Tutorial implemented
  • Stage: Magma Ruins available
  • Basic currency system implemented
  • Starfighter unlocks available upon stage completion

Minimum system requirements:

  • 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
